data.title: Gary Barber, Spyglass Entertainment: Profile and Biography
data.meta_description: Gary Barber is Co-Chairman/CEO/Co-Founder at Spyglass Entertainment. See Gary Barber's compensation, career history, education, & memberships.
data.text:
Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world
